coursesList.courseDescription: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to web development, covering HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

courseSections.sectionContent: Learn the fundamentals of HTML and how to structure web pages.

courseSections.title: Module 2: CSS Essentials
courseSections.sectionContent: Explore the basics of CSS for styling web pages.

coursesList.courseDescription: An introductory course to Python programming, covering basic concepts and practical applications.

courseSections.sectionContent: Introduction to Python and its programming environment.

courseSections.title: Python Basics: Variables and Data Types
courseSections.sectionContent: Understanding variables, data types, and basic operations in Python.

courseSections.title: Control Structures and Functions in Python
courseSections.sectionContent: Learn about control structures and writing functions in Python.

coursesList.courseDescription: This course introduces the core concepts of data science, including data analysis, visualization, and machine learning.

courseSections.sectionContent: The basics of data analysis and manipulation.

courseSections.title: Data Visualization Techniques
courseSections.sectionContent: Explore various tools and techniques for data visualization.

courseSections.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
courseSections.sectionContent: An overview of machine learning concepts and applications.
